page.title: 10SPORTING EVENTS IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is{Paul Nearn.}I am 12 years old.I live near Cheddar. My favourite sport is football. I support Southampton and my local team of Draycott. Most of my friends like football but a couple of boys are breakdancers. {Breakdancing}came in about two years ago but is on the way out.It is a type of dance in which people throw themselves about doing backspins and headspins. Opposite my house I can see{hang {gliders}going off the Mendip Hills.There is also{clay pigeon {shooting.}Around the area people are very fond of rugby.There is also a swimming pool in Cheddar.
